law.text: Any person who violates or aids in the violation of the provisions of KRS 309.130 to 309.1399 shall upon conviction be fined not less than five hundred dollars ($500) nor more than one thousand dollars ($1,000).
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 48, sec. 11, effective June 25, 2009. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 337, sec. 10, effective July 15, 1994.
